go-pro-screw.title: GoPro Thumbscrew
go-pro-screw.description: Thumbscrew for attaching your GoPro to mounts

go-pro-5.title: GoPro Hero 5 Black
go-pro-5.description: Action camp, water-proof up to 33 feet

go-pro-usb.title: Portable GoPro Charger with Cable
go-pro-usb.description: GoPro external charger with USB cable. Water resistant.

go-pro-dual-mount.title: Twin Mount for GoPro Cameras
go-pro-dual-mount.description: Allows you to mount 2 GoPro cameras to the same mount. Mount points can be rotated by 90 degrees, giving you 4 directions for which you could point the cameras.

gear-360.title: Gear 260
gear-360.description: (discontinued for 2017 edition) GoPro 360-video and photo camera. For making 360 content for social media.

sigma-70-300.title: Sigma 70-300mm lens
sigma-70-300.description: 70-300mm lens with auto focus for micro 4/3 mount cameras.

canon-24-105.title: 24-105mm Canon lens
canon-24-105.description: 24-105mm EF Mount lens for full-frame cameras

gopro-tripple-battery-charger.title: GoPro Battery Charger
gopro-tripple-battery-charger.description: Chargers up to 3 GoPro batteries for your GoPro 9 or GoPro 10.

canon-135.title: Canon 135mm Lens
canon-135.description: 135mm focal length, Closest focusing distance: 3 feet. Ultra-low Dispersion glass with Fluorite elements; inner focusing ring

tamron-f-teleconverter.title: Tamron Teleconverter
tamron-f-teleconverter.description: 1.4x teleconverter adapter for Canon EF lenses
